    • Constructor Detail

      • House

        public House()
        Creates an instance of House and two new meters to track used units

      • House

        public House​(Meter electricMeter,
             Meter waterMeter)
        Creates an instance of House and attaches meters to track electricity/water consumption
        Parameters:
        electricMeter - Meter to track electricity units, can be BatteryMeter
        waterMeter - Meter to track water units

    • Method Detail

      • addElectricAppliance

        public void addElectricAppliance​(Appliance newApp)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds an Appliance that uses water to the house
        Parameters:
        newApp - An Appliance to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when appliance doesn't use electricity

      • addWaterAppliance

        public void addWaterAppliance​(Appliance newApp)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds an Appliance that uses water to the house
        Parameters:
        newApp - An Appliance to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when appliance doesn't use water

      • removeAppliance

        public void removeAppliance​(Appliance oldApp)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Removes the appliance for the house
        Parameters:
        oldApp - An Appliance to be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when appliance is not present

      • numAppliances

        public int numAppliances()
        Returns:
        number of appliances in house

      • activate

        public double activate()
        Simulates the passing of 1hr in the house
        Returns:
        A double recording final cost of running all the appliances.

      • activate

        public double activate​(int hours)
        Simulates the passing of [hours] hours in the house
        Parameters:
        hours - Numbers of hours to run the house for
        Returns:
        A double containing the total cost of running the house for [hours]
